price: 18 et qu’il verra le ciel s’entrouvrir. Sa menace devra s’accomplir.
arabic: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرُۢ بِهِۦۚ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُۥ مَفۡعُولًا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: al-samāu munfaṭirun bihi kāna waʿduhu mafʿūlan
